maybe it's related to fact that we added `netgo` build tag and it has bug on win: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/57757
please recompile erigon without this tag: just remove it from .ps1 as done by https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/7421 or switch to `devel` branch.
